articles.title: PM Modi likely to flip coin at toss for India vs Australia 4th Test tomorrow, do commentary: Reports - Moneycontrol
articles.description: At the historic event, Prime Minister Narendra Modi would be accompanied by his Australian counterpart Anthony Albanese, who arrived in Ahmedabad on March 8 for an official visit.
articles.content:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi is likely to flip the coin for the fourth and final Test match between India vs Australia, that is scheduled to be played in Ahmedabad on March 9, reports said.
